summary: This is an email from the Correctional Programs Northeast Regional Office requesting institutions to review, correct, and/or add appropriate DNA assignments in accordance with policy 5311.01 by July 15, 2019. It appears to be administrative correspondence regarding DNA sample collection procedures.

events.title: Deadline for DNA assignment review
events.description: Institutions are required to provide assurance that they have reviewed, corrected, and/or added appropriate DNA assignments in accordance with policy 5311.01.

keyFacts: The document is an administrative email from the Correctional Programs Northeast Regional Office dated July 8, 2019.
It requests institutions to review and correct DNA assignments according to policy 5311.01.
A response deadline of July 15, 2019, is specified for providing assurance of compliance.
The document appears to be routine administrative correspondence regarding DNA sample collection procedures.
No specific individuals, Epstein-related events, or case details are mentioned in the provided text.
